description: Serbian democracy looks fragile as many opposition groups boycott Sunday's general election.
title: Serbia election: Opposition scorns 'hoax' vote in EU candidate state
title_page: Serbia election: Opposition scorns 'hoax' vote in EU candidate state - BBC News
maintext: "For it to succeed, they would have to have an audience which is interested in legitimacy - either the domestic public or the internationals. But none of them seem to be terribly bothered by legitimacy - and they don't have a lot of faith in the opposition to create greater legitimacy than the party that's ruling now."
